description.value:
You channel the power of Hell to transform into a hellcat battle form. While in this form, you gain the beast and evil traits. You can Dismiss the effect.

You gain the following characteristics and abilities:

  • Your size changes to Large.
  • Your stride Speed is 35 feet.
  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • Resistance 5 to physical damage (except silver), and weakness 5 to spirit damage.
  • Resistance 10 to fire.
  • Darkvision.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.
  • Fade into the Light r (illusion)
    Trigger You begin your turn in bright light.
    Effect You become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible} until you are no longer in bright light. If the you use a hostile action, the invisibility ends after that hostile action is completed.

You gain the following attacks. You are trained with them. Your attack modifier with these attacks is +20, unless your own attack modifier is higher, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based.

  • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d12+10 piercing
  • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d8+10 slashing
